mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(income),0) from t_deliveryman_fund where deliveryman_id= #{id} and type=#{type}
SELECT id,deliveryman_id,income,create_time,order_detail_id,type FROM t_deliveryman_fund where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(create_time) and deliveryman_id=#{id} and type='1'
SELECT id,deliveryman_id,income,create_time,order_detail_id,type FROM t_deliveryman_fund where to_days(create_time) = to_days(now()) and deliveryman_id=#{id} and type='1'
SELECT id,deliveryman_id,income,create_time,order_detail_id,type FROM t_deliveryman_fund where TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( create_time) <= 1 and deliveryman_id=#{id} and type='1'
